deepLinks.name: The Official Microsoft Blog
deepLinks.snippet: Microsoft Circular Centers build on our earlier circular cloud initiatives to extend the lifecycle of our servers and minimize the waste sent to landfills. In Amsterdam, our Microsoft Circular Center pilot reduced downtime at the datacenter and increased the availability of server and network parts for our own reuse and buy-back by our suppliers.

value.name: Microsoft was warned months ago — now, the Hafnium hack has grown to gigantic proportions
value.description: On Friday, cybersecurity journalists Brian Krebs and Andy Greenberg reported that as many as 30,000 organizations had been compromised in an unprecedented email server hack, believed to have originated from a state-sponsored Chinese hacking group known as Hafnium.

value.name: Microsoft Surface Laptop 4 will reportedly include both AMD and Intel configurations
value.description: The biggest news is that the new Surface Laptop will come with both Intel and AMD options. The AMD models will include chips from the Ryzen 4000 mobile series, including the Ryzen 5 4680U and the Ryzen 7 4980U.

value.name: Everything you need to know about the Microsoft Exchange Server hack
value.description: Four zero-day vulnerabilities in Microsoft Exchange Server are being actively exploited by a state-sponsored threat group from China and appear to have been adopted by other cyberattackers in widespread attacks.

value.name: Microsoft's $7.5 billion Bethesda deal has been approved by the EU
value.description: Microsoft's purchase of Bethesda-parent ZeniMax Media is nearing the finish line. On Monday the European Commission announced on its website that it has approved the deal under the "EU Merger Regulation.

value.name: Intel And Microsoft Collaborate On DARPA Program That Pioneers A New Frontier Of Ultra-Secure Computing
value.description: Say what? You can change something in encrypted data without first decrypting it? Yes, and the technology is called Homomorphic Encryption.

value.name: 'Significant' vulnerabilities in Microsoft's Exchange servers -WH
value.description: The White House said on Friday that the hackers exploiting the recently disclosed flaw in Microsoft's Exchange email software are an ongoing problem.

value.name: Microsoft Attack Blamed on China Morphs Into Global Crisis
value.description: Mar.07 -- A sophisticated attack on Microsoft Corp.’s widely used business email software is morphing into a global cybersecurity crisis. Su Keenan reports on "Bloomberg Markets: Asia."

value.name: 'Active threat' after Microsoft hack -White House
value.description: A Microsoft representative said it was working with the government to guide vulnerable clients, as more attacks are expected.

value.name: Microsoft Tries To Reclaim Entry
value.description: Microsoft rises back above 50-day line. Close to 232.96 buy point ... probably could wait to get at least above 21-day line or last week's highs.
